languages.text:
{n}Из теней вас окликает уже хорошо знакомый баритон.{/n}
"Ключ отворяет дверь, а та ведет
К другой, что лишь случайность отопрет.
Я шансом буду, отворю засовы,
Твоя же роль — бежать, разбить оковы".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Из теней вас окликает уже хорошо знакомый баритон.{/n}
"Ключ отворяет дверь, а та ведет
К другой, что лишь случайность отопрет.
Я шансом буду, отворю засовы,
Твоя же роль — бежать, разбить оковы".
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}The already familiar baritone calls out to you from the shadows.{/n}
"The key unlocks a door that then will lead,
To one that only happenstance will free.
Your chance I'll be, to me the bolts will cede,
Your part comes next — to break the bonds and flee."
languages.original_text:
{n}Из теней вас окликает уже хорошо знакомый баритон.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}某个你已经熟悉的男中音从阴影中呼唤着你。{/n}
“这把钥匙已经打开了栅栏，
通往只有凭借机遇才能获得自由的彼岸。
我便是这个机遇，我将解除门闩。
至于你，你要打破束缚，逃出生天。”
languages.original_text:
{n}The already familiar baritone calls out to you from the shadows.{/n}
"The key unlocks a door that then will lead,
To one that only happenstance will free.
Your chance I'll be, to me the bolts will cede,
Your part comes next — to break the bonds and flee."

我便是这个机遇，我将解除门闩。
至于你，你要打破束缚，逃出生天。”
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}Un barítono ya familiar te habla desde las sombras.{/n}
«La llave abre una puerta que guiará
a alguien que solo liberará la casualidad.
Seré tu oportunidad, ante mí la entrada cederá:
rompe las cadenas y recupera la libertad».
languages.original_text:
{n}The already familiar baritone calls out to you from the shadows.{/n}
"The key unlocks a door that then will lead,
To one that only happenstance will free.
Your chance I'll be, to me the bolts will cede,
Your part comes next — to break the bonds and flee."

Seré tu oportunidad, ante mí la entrada cederá:
rompe las cadenas y recupera la libertad».
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}聞きなれた低い声が影の中から語りかけてきた。{/n}
「鍵で開けられた扉が導く、
偶然により解放される道へ。
僕は君のチャンスとなり、留め金は僕へと譲られて
次は君が演じる番―縛りを解いて彼方へ逃げて」
languages.original_text:
{n}The already familiar baritone calls out to you from the shadows.{/n}
"The key unlocks a door that then will lead,
To one that only happenstance will free.
Your chance I'll be, to me the bolts will cede,
Your part comes next — to break the bonds and flee."

次は君が演じる番―縛りを解いて彼方へ逃げて」
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}Der nun schon vertraute Bariton ruft aus den Schatten nach dir.{/n}
"Der Schlüssel öffnet eine Tür, die führt
zu einem, den der Zufall nur befreit.
Für mich allein der Riegel sich nur rührt.
Ihr brecht sodann die Ketten, seid bereit."
languages.original_text:
{n}The already familiar baritone calls out to you from the shadows.{/n}
"The key unlocks a door that then will lead,
To one that only happenstance will free.
Your chance I'll be, to me the bolts will cede,
Your part comes next — to break the bonds and flee."

languages.text:
{n}La voix de baryton que vous reconnaîtriez entre mille s'adresse à vous depuis les ombres.{/n}
« La clé ouvre une porte qui vous conduira
À celui que seul le hasard saura affranchir.
Je serai votre chance, car pour moi cette serrure s'ouvrira,
Puis vous entrerez en scène, pour briser les chaînes et fuir. »
languages.original_text:
{n}The already familiar baritone calls out to you from the shadows.{/n}
"The key unlocks a door that then will lead,
To one that only happenstance will free.
Your chance I'll be, to me the bolts will cede,
Your part comes next — to break the bonds and flee."

traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
{n}Hâlihazırda aşina olduğun bariton ses, gölgelerden sana sesleniyor.{/n}
"Anahtarın açacağı kapı, yol gösterecek sonrasında
Sadece tesadüften ibaret özgür kalacak olana.
Senin şansın benim sürgüleri söküp atman için,
Ardından sahne senin bağlarını koparıp kaçabilmen için."
languages.original_text:
{n}The already familiar baritone calls out to you from the shadows.{/n}
"The key unlocks a door that then will lead,
To one that only happenstance will free.
Your chance I'll be, to me the bolts will cede,
Your part comes next — to break the bonds and flee."

"Anahtarın açacağı kapı, yol gösterecek sonrasında
Sadece tesadüften ibaret özgür kalacak olana.
Senin şansın benim, sürgüleri söküp atman için
Ardından sahne senin, bağlarını koparıp kaçabilmen için."
traits.speaker: Zanni
